item.title: Learning Resources of Swift Language (Unstructured)

item.title: Learning Resources of Swift Language (Structured)
item.description: Beginner Official language guide by Swift.org Video course “iOS 12 app development bootcamp” @Udemy by Angela Yu Video “Introduction to Swift” @Apple WWDC 2014, by Tim Isted and Dave Addey Intermediate Book “Swifter - Swift Must Know Tips (in Chinese)" by Wei Wang Book “Swift実践入門 (in Japanese)" by 石川洋資，西山
